content.raw:
I’m assuming:

`/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/image` =  `/X4/front/image_raw` = old `/rgbd_camera/depth/image_raw`

`/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/depth_image` = `/rgbd_camera/depth/points`

There is only the RGBD sensor on that vehicle configuration so the image\_raw can’t be coming from another camera.

‌

from: \(also: camera\_info, image have 2 tcp connections, depth\_image has 1 tcp connection on the ROS side there is a bridge node for camera\_info and image but /rgbd\_camera/depth/points is coming directly from Ignition\)

```
developer@1d9b479bf9f2:~/ignition_ws$ ign topic -l
/clock
/model/X4/cmd_vel_relay
/model/X4/command/motor_speed
/model/X4/odometry
/model/X4/pose
/neighbors
/subt/score
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/clock
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/dynamic_pose/info
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/air_pressure/air_pressure
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/camera_info
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/depth_image
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/image
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/front_laser/scan
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/imu_sensor/imu
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/magnetometer/magnetometer
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/pose/info
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/scene/deletion
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/scene/info
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/state
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/stats
```
content.html:
I’m assuming:

/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/image = /X4/front/image_raw = old /rgbd_camera/depth/image_raw

/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/depth_image = /rgbd_camera/depth/points

There is only the RGBD sensor on that vehicle configuration so the image_raw can’t be coming from another camera.

‌

from: (also: camera_info, image have 2 tcp connections, depth_image has 1 tcp connection on the ROS side there is a bridge node for camera_info and image but /rgbd_camera/depth/points is coming directly from Ignition)

developer@1d9b479bf9f2:~/ignition_ws$ ign topic -l
/clock
/model/X4/cmd_vel_relay
/model/X4/command/motor_speed
/model/X4/odometry
/model/X4/pose
/neighbors
/subt/score
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/clock
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/dynamic_pose/info
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/air_pressure/air_pressure
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/camera_info
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/depth_image
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/image
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/front_laser/scan
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/imu_sensor/imu
